Contributing Authors

  • Gene Louis Kim

    Graduate Student

    Gene is a PhD candidate supervised by Len (since 2015) at the University of Rochester Computer Science Department and leads the ULF project.

  • Lenhart Schubert

    Professor

    Len is a Professor of Computer Science at the University of Rochester working on language, dialogue agents, knowledge representation, inference and planning. Len is the PI for the ULF project.
